Clear last note Clear last note | Clear all Clear all Exact search | Diatonic search | Melodic search | Rythmic search Mirror search: Yes: No: Last note duration : 4 tps 4 tps | 2 tps 2 tps | 1 tps 1 tps | 1/2 tps 1/2 tps | 1/4 tps 1/4 tps | 1/16 tps 1/16 tps | note pointee note pointee Piano Fin Présentation ajax content here ending keyboardZone ajax content here ending collectionsZone fin div .access   fin header .page-header Main ACCUEIL NEUMA is a digital library of music scores encoded in MusicXML en MEI. Its objectives are threefold. First, we give an on-line access to rare and often hardly accessible corpora, produced with a precise and homogeneous editing process. Second, Neuma demonstrates with interactive search and analytic tools how music notation can support advanced functionalities to explore digital scores. Finally, we also supply dissemination tools and service to let you access to large corpora of scores for your own purposes.   Corpora     go right go right go left go left Load the user/object permissions for the current corpus Airs and songs from all periods and areas Airs and songs from all periods and areas Load the user/object permissions for the current corpus Selected works of selected composers Selected works of selected composers Load the user/object permissions for the current corpus Music pieces of all styles, periods, and genres Music pieces of all styles, periods, and genres Load the user/object permissions for the current corpus Pour l'étude du chant ecclésiastique à l'époque moderne Pour l'étude du chant ecclésiastique à l'époque moderne fin du train fin du slider fin du homeColls COLONNE DE GAUCHE - ÉCHANTILLONS COLONNE DE GAUCHE - ÉCHANTILLONS Bookmarks Missus est Gabriel... nuntians ei Missus est Gabriel... nuntians ei in Processional 1723 Processional 1723 Patefactae sunt januae Patefactae sunt januae in Processional 1723 Processional 1723 Qui vicerit faciam Qui vicerit faciam in Processional 1723 Processional 1723 Isti qui amicti Isti qui amicti in Processional 1723 Processional 1723 Benedictus qui venit...
